item.title: By: Lindas Frases
item.dc:creator: Lindas Frases
item.description: Great! what really worked for us was to use ScreenSharing capability. Have a conversation leader (kind of a Scrum Master) who would cut the middle talk and get back focus of all the group to the topic. Meetings should be short so people do not get distracted. I hope this helps!
